        public AndroidInput(Context context,
            View view,
            float scaleX,
            float scaleY)
        Constructor that takes the app context, current View object and scale to create an input
        Parameters:
        context - Current context of the app
        view - current view triggered to handle event
        scaleX - scale of view in x direction
        scaleY - scale of view in y direction

      • isTouchDown

        public boolean isTouchDown(int pointer)
        Asks whether specific touch event is down
        Specified by:
        isTouchDown in interface Input
        Parameters:
        pointer - identifier for touch event, should be used to refer to fingers on a touch screen
        Returns:
        true if the touch event at the pointer is down, otherwise false
